title: Coronation Street spoilers: Geoff's abuse of Yasmeen gets worse
text:
Geoff Metcalfe (Ian Bartholomew) has left viewers screaming at their television screens in rage recently as his coercive control of Yasmeen Nazir (Shelley King) has stepped up a gear in Coronation Street. As he has controlled her with manipulative and gaslighting behaviour, she has become more reliant on her – and moves such as staging a burglary and hiding secret cameras have shown just how far he is prepared to go to eradicate Yasmeen’s independence.

And Alya Nazir (Sair Khan), who has had concerns about Geoff before, is about to infuritate him as it becomes clear that he has his eye on Speed Daal too. As Yameen and Geoff are run off their feet during a busy shift, he suggests they buy into the business, arguing that they do all the hard work anyway.

Yasmeen puts the suggestion to Alya – but is forced to relay to a fuming Geoff that she is happy for Yasmeen to invest but not for him. As he storms off, Yasmeen feels stuck in the middle but Geoff has another plan and contacts Zeedan about selling his share of the business.

A smug Geoff tells an annoyed Alya that Zeedan is selling to him and as Alya asks Yasmeen if she really wants Geoff to be so invested in every part of her life, her gran replies that she is happy for Geoff to be on board. But does she mean it?

Geoff already has his eye on making changes to the business and immediately suggests that they scrap the no alcohol policy to bring in more cash, leaving Alya furious. But as Geoff and Alya look set to go to war over the running of the business, it will be Yasmeen who suffers as Geoff inevitably takes his annoyances out on her.

Will he seek to drive a permanent wedge between Yasmeen and her granddaughter? And will Alya figure out his game?

One to watch: Friday 18th October at 7:30pm on ITV.
